verses.name: Ezekiel 40:25
verses.text: And there were windows in it and in the arches thereof round about, like those windows: the length was fifty cubits, and the breadth five and twenty cubits.

verses.name: Ezekiel 40:26
verses.text: And there were seven steps to go up to it, and the arches thereof were before them: and it had palm trees, one on this side, and another on that side, upon the posts thereof.

verses.name: Ezekiel 40:27
verses.text: And there was a gate in the inner court toward the south: and he measured from gate to gate toward the south an hundred cubits.
